name: Nesca
body:
**Nesca_3** - is a network bot, created for finding non-indexed sites and services. Designed to simplify darknet-researches, it grants you a convenient tool with a user-friendly UI. *** ### ![Nesca DNS-scan mode](http://nesca.d3w.org/images/nescaDNSmode.png)
### ![Nesca IRC mode](http://nesca.d3w.org/images/nescaIRC.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
